programme.title: Big Ass Spider!
programme.desc: The unlikely heroic duo of a blue-collar exterminator and Latino security guard must save the day when a military major loses control of a giant spider rampaging through the city of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Lost Child
programme.desc: An army veteran returns home to find her brother, only to discover a lost boy in the woods behind her home. After taking him in, she discovers local folklore about a lifedraining spirit that comes in the form of a child; the Tatterdemalion.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 5
programme.desc: A deep dive into the depths of unsolved murders, mysteries, and myths with narrator Jans Holstrom.

programme.title: Dry Blood
programme.desc: In a rural mountain town, an unstable drug addict must unravel a surreal murder mystery as he’s terrorized by malevolent ghosts, a deranged sheriff, and the frightening hallucinations from his withdrawal.

programme.title: The Special
programme.desc: Suspecting his wife of infidelity, Jerrys best friend offers him The Special, a supernatural encounter in the back room of a brothel. But everything has a price, and Jerrys night of pleasure sets off a dark chain of events as he spirals into obsession - because once you've had The Special, you can't go back to the ordinary.

programme.title: Uncle Peckerhead
programme.desc: When a punk band scores their first tour, life on the road proves tough when they are joined by a man-eating demon as a roadie

programme.title: The Patrol
programme.desc: Under attack from a well-equipped and relentless enemy, a special forces patrol must use its wits and cunning to survive. Faced with rising tensions under the command of a Captain who can't control his own unit, it becomes a race against time for the soldiers as they fight their way across a brutal and unforgiving desert.

programme.title: Lasso
programme.desc: An Active Senior Tour group outing turns deadly when the crazed, bloodthirsty cowboys from a local rodeo attraction start abducting and killing people!

programme.title: Vikingdom
programme.desc: Based on Viking mythology, Eirick (Dominic Purcell) battles from hell and beyond to retrieve the mystical artifact, Odin’s Horn, before Thor and his army can unleash its powers to conquer the world.

programme.title: The Lake
programme.desc: A gigantic and bloodthirsty monster emerges from a lake and unleashes its fury on a small town, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

programme.title: Nail In the Coffin: The Fall & Rise of Vampiro
programme.desc: A rare glimpse into the legendary career of wrestling icon, Vampiro, as he grapples with his demons and life after fame. Straight from one of wrestling's most outspoken characters, this is a candid look beyond the ring

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 5
programme.desc: A deep dive into the depths of unsolved murders, mysteries, and myths with narrator Jans Holstrom.

programme.title: Red Letter Day
programme.desc: While adjusting to a new life in a quiet suburban community, a recently divorced mother and her two teens receive mysterious red letters instructing them each to kill or be killed.

programme.title: They're Inside
programme.desc: Trapped in a secluded cabin in the woods, Robin, and her sister, Cody, must overcome their dark past while battling threats from deadly masked strangers.

programme.title: 6 Degrees of Hell
programme.desc: Six individuals are caught up in a supernatural perfect storm, as an evil lays claim to one of them while threatening to tear apart the soul of a small Pennsylvania town.

programme.title: Tales of Halloween
programme.desc: Ten stories from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night. This creepy anthology combines classic Halloween tales with the stuff of nightmares.
